channel.title: CVE Feed for pimcore -- ecommerce-framework-bundle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pimcore -- ecommerce-framework-bundle

item.title: CVE-2024-21665|2024-08-01T22:27:35.901Z -- pimcore -- ecommerce-framework-bundle
item.description: ecommerce-framework-bundle is the Pimcore Ecommerce Framework Bundle. An authenticated and unauthorized user can access the back-office orders list and be able to query over the information returned. Access control and permissions are not being enforced. This vulnerability has been patched in version 1.0.10.
